00108 /* Hashtable used to cache the hostname, accessed by their IP addess */
00109 hash_table_t            * ht_client_id ; 
00110 hash_table_t            * ht_client_id_reverse ; 
00111 extern nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00112

00114 
00130 unsigned long client_id_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00131 {
00132   unsigned long hash_func ;
00133   clientid4    clientid ;
00134 
00135   clientid = *((clientid4 *)(buffclef->pdata)) ;
00136 
00137   /* Sum upper and lower 32bits fields to build the key */
00138   hash_func = ( (unsigned long)( clientid &0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) +
00139                 (unsigned long)( clientid >> 32 ) ) ;
00140 
00141   return hash_func % p_hparam->index_size ;
00142 } /*  client_id_value_hash_func */
00143 
00144 
00160 unsigned long client_id_value_hash_func_reverse( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00161 {
00162   unsigned long  sum = 0 ;
00163   unsigned int  i = 0 ;
00164   unsigned char c ;
00165 
00166   /* Compute the sum of all the characters */
00167   for( i = 0 , c = ((char *)buffclef->pdata)[0] ; ((char *)buffclef->pdata)[i] != '\0' ; c=((char *)buffclef->pdata)[++i], sum += c ) ;
00168 
00169   return (unsigned long)( sum % p_hparam->index_size ) ;
00170 } /*  client_id_reverse_value_hash_func */
00171 
00188 unsigned long client_id_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00189 {
00190   unsigned long hash_func ;
00191   clientid4    clientid ;
00192 
00193   clientid = *((clientid4 *)(buffclef->pdata)) ;
00194 
00195   /* Xor upper and lower 32bits fields to build the key */
00196   hash_func = ( (unsigned long)( clientid & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) ^ 
00197                 (unsigned long)( clientid >> 32 ) ) ;
00198  
00199   return hash_func ;
00200 } /* client_id_rbt_hash_func */
00201 
00202 unsigned long client_id_rbt_hash_func_reverse( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00203 {
00204   clientid4  result ;
00205 
00206   if( nfs_client_id_compute( (char *)buffclef->pdata,
00207                              &result ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00208         return 0 ;
00209 
00210   return ( (unsigned long)(result & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) );
00211 } /* ip_name_rbt_hash_func */

00226 int compare_client_id(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00227 {
00228   clientid4 cl1 = *((clientid4 *)(buff1->pdata)) ;
00229   clientid4 cl2 = *((clientid4 *)(buff2->pdata)) ;
00230   return (cl1 == cl2)?0:1 ;
00231 } /* compare_xid */
00232 
00233 int compare_client_id_reverse(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00234 {
00235   char * cl1 = (char *)(buff1->pdata) ;
00236   char * cl2 = (char *)(buff2->pdata) ;
00237   return strncmp( cl1, cl2, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00238 } /* compare_xid */

00258   clientid = *((clientid4 *)(pbuff->pdata)) ;

00266                   (char *)(pbuff->pdata) );

00269 int display_client_id_val( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str ) 
00270 {
00271    nfs_client_id_t * precord ;
00272 
00273    precord = (nfs_client_id_t *)(pbuff->pdata) ;
00274 
00275    return sprintf( str, "#%s#=>%llu cb_prog=%u r_addr=%s r_netid=%s", 
00276                    precord->client_name, 
00277                    (unsigned long long)precord->clientid, 
00278                    precord->cb_program, 
00279                    precord->client_r_addr,
00280                    precord->client_r_netid ) ;

00299 int nfs_client_id_add(  clientid4         clientid,
00300                         nfs_client_id_t   client_record,
00301                         nfs_client_id_t * nfs_client_id_pool )
00302 {
00303   hash_buffer_t       buffkey  ;
00304   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00305   hash_buffer_t       buffkey_reverse  ;
00306   hash_buffer_t       buffdata_reverse ;
00307   nfs_client_id_t   * pnfs_client_id  = NULL ;
00308   clientid4         * pclientid = NULL ;
00309 
00310 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00311   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00312   BuddySetDebugLabel( "nfs_client_id_t" ) ;
00313 #endif
00314 
00315   /* Entry to be cached */
00316   GET_PREALLOC( pnfs_client_id, 
00317                 nfs_client_id_pool, 
00318                 nfs_param.worker_param.nb_client_id_prealloc, 
00319                 nfs_client_id_t, 
00320                 next_alloc ) ;
00321 
00322 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00323   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00324   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00325 #endif
00326 
00327   if( pnfs_client_id == NULL ) 
00328     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00329 
00330   if( ( pclientid = (clientid4 *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( clientid4 ) ) ) == NULL )
00331     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00332  
00333   if( ( buffkey_reverse.pdata = (caddr_t)Mem_Alloc( MAXNAMLEN ) ) == NULL ) 
00334     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00335 
00336   /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this, 
00337    * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00338   *pclientid = clientid ;
00339   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)pclientid ;
00340   buffkey.len = sizeof( clientid ) ;
00341 
00342   *pnfs_client_id = client_record ;
00343   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_client_id ;
00344   buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_client_id_t ) ;
00345   
00346   if( HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht_client_id, &buffkey, &buffdata, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_OVERWRITE ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00347     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00348  
00349   /* Keep information in reverse hash table */
00350   strncpy( (char *)(buffkey_reverse.pdata), client_record.client_name, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00351   buffkey_reverse.len = MAXNAMLEN ;
00352 
00353   buffdata_reverse.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_client_id ;
00354   buffdata_reverse.len = sizeof( nfs_client_id_t ) ;
00355    
00356   if( HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht_client_id_reverse, &buffkey_reverse, &buffdata_reverse, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_OVERWRITE ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00357     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00358 
00359 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00360   printf( "-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-> ht_client_id \n" ) ;
00361   HashTable_Print( ht_client_id ) ;
00362   printf( "-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-> ht_client_id_reverse \n" ) ;
00363   HashTable_Print( ht_client_id_reverse ) ;
00364 #endif
00365 
00366   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ; 
00367 } /* nfs_client_id_add */

00385 int nfs_client_id_set(  clientid4         clientid,
00386                         nfs_client_id_t   client_record,
00387                         nfs_client_id_t * nfs_client_id_pool )
00388 {
00389   hash_buffer_t       buffkey  ;
00390   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00391   hash_buffer_t       buffkey_reverse  ;
00392   hash_buffer_t       buffdata_reverse ;
00393   nfs_client_id_t   * pnfs_client_id  = NULL ;
00394   clientid4         * pclientid = NULL ;
00395 
00396 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00397   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00398   BuddySetDebugLabel( "nfs_client_id_t" ) ;
00399 #endif
00400 
00401   /* Entry to be cached */
00402   GET_PREALLOC( pnfs_client_id, 
00403                 nfs_client_id_pool, 
00404                 nfs_param.worker_param.nb_client_id_prealloc, 
00405                 nfs_client_id_t, 
00406                 next_alloc ) ;
00407 
00408 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00409   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00410   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00411 #endif
00412 
00413   if( pnfs_client_id == NULL ) 
00414     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00415 
00416   if( ( pclientid = (clientid4 *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( clientid4 ) ) ) == NULL )
00417     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00418   
00419   if( ( buffkey_reverse.pdata = (caddr_t)Mem_Alloc( MAXNAMLEN ) ) == NULL ) 
00420     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00421   
00422   /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this, 
00423    * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00424   *pclientid = clientid ;
00425   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)pclientid ;
00426   buffkey.len = sizeof( clientid ) ;
00427 
00428 
00429   *pnfs_client_id = client_record ;
00430   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_client_id ;
00431   buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_client_id_t ) ;
00432   
00433   if( HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht_client_id, &buffkey, &buffdata, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_OVERWRITE ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00434     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00435  
00436   /* Reverse hashtable */
00437   strncpy( (char *)(buffkey_reverse.pdata), client_record.client_name, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00438   buffkey_reverse.len = MAXNAMLEN ;
00439   
00440   buffdata_reverse.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_client_id ;
00441   buffdata_reverse.len = sizeof( nfs_client_id_t ) ;
00442 
00443   if( HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht_client_id_reverse, &buffkey_reverse, &buffdata_reverse, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_OVERWRITE ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00444     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00445 
00446   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ; 
00447 } /* nfs_client_id_set */

00461 int  nfs_client_id_get( clientid4         clientid,
00462                         nfs_client_id_t * client_id_res )
00463 {
00464   hash_buffer_t       buffkey ;
00465   hash_buffer_t       buffval ;
00466   int                 status ;
00467   nfs_client_id_t   * pnfs_client_id = NULL ;
00468   clientid4         * pclientid      = NULL ;
00469  
00470   if( client_id_res == NULL ) 
00471     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00472  
00473   if( ( pclientid = (clientid4 *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( clientid4 ) ) ) == NULL )
00474     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00475 
00476   *pclientid = clientid ; 
00477   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)pclientid ;
00478   buffkey.len = sizeof( clientid4 )  ;
00479   
00480   if( HashTable_Get( ht_client_id, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00481     {
00482       pnfs_client_id = (nfs_client_id_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00483 
00484       *client_id_res = *pnfs_client_id ;
00485       status = CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00486 
00487 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00488       printf( "-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-> ht_client_id \n" ) ;
00489       HashTable_Print( ht_client_id ) ;
00490       printf( "-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-> ht_client_id_reverse \n" ) ;
00491       HashTable_Print( ht_client_id_reverse ) ;
00492 #endif
00493     }
00494   else
00495     {
00496       status = CLIENT_ID_NOT_FOUND ;
00497     }
00498 
00499   /* free the allocated key */
00500   Mem_Free( pclientid ) ;
00501 
00502 
00503   return status ;
00504 } /* nfs_client_id_get */
00505 
00506 int  nfs_client_id_get_reverse( char * key,
00507                                 nfs_client_id_t * client_id_res )
00508 {
00509   hash_buffer_t       buffkey ;
00510   hash_buffer_t       buffval ;
00511   int                 status ;
00512   nfs_client_id_t   * pnfs_client_id = NULL ;
00513  
00514   if( client_id_res == NULL ) 
00515     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00516  
00517   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)key ;
00518   buffkey.len = MAXNAMLEN ;
00519   
00520   if( HashTable_Get( ht_client_id_reverse, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00521     {
00522       pnfs_client_id = (nfs_client_id_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00523 
00524       *client_id_res = *pnfs_client_id ;
00525       status = CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00526     }
00527   else
00528     {
00529       status = CLIENT_ID_NOT_FOUND ;
00530     }
00531 
00532   return status ;
00533 } /* nfs_client_id_get_reverse */

00548 int nfs_client_id_remove( clientid4         clientid,
00549                           nfs_client_id_t * nfs_client_id_pool )
00550 {
00551   hash_buffer_t       buffkey , old_key, old_key_reverse, old_value ;
00552   nfs_client_id_t   * pnfs_client_id  = NULL ;
00553   clientid4         * pclientid = NULL ;
00554 
00555   if( ( pclientid = (clientid4 *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( clientid4 ) ) ) == NULL )
00556     return CLIENT_ID_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00557 
00558   *pclientid = clientid ; 
00559   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)pclientid ;
00560   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00561 
00562    /* Remove entry */
00563 
00564    if( HashTable_Del( ht_client_id, &buffkey, &old_key, &old_value ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00565    {
00566        Mem_Free( pclientid ) ;
00567        return CLIENT_ID_NOT_FOUND;
00568    }
00569    
00570    /* Remove reverse entry */
00571    pnfs_client_id = (nfs_client_id_t *)old_value.pdata ;
00572    
00573    buffkey.pdata = pnfs_client_id->client_name;
00574    buffkey.len   = MAXNAMLEN;
00575    
00576    if( HashTable_Del( ht_client_id_reverse, &buffkey, &old_key_reverse, &old_value ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00577    {
00578        RELEASE_PREALLOC( pnfs_client_id, nfs_client_id_pool, next_alloc ) ;
00579        Mem_Free( old_key.pdata ) ;
00580        Mem_Free( pclientid ) ;
00581        return CLIENT_ID_NOT_FOUND;
00582    }
00583    
00584    
00585    RELEASE_PREALLOC( pnfs_client_id, nfs_client_id_pool, next_alloc ) ;
00586    Mem_Free( old_key_reverse.pdata ) ;
00587    Mem_Free( old_key.pdata ) ;
00588    Mem_Free( pclientid ) ;
00589       
00590    return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00591    
00592 } /* nfs_client_id_remove */

00607 int nfs_Init_client_id( nfs_client_id_parameter_t  param ) 
00608 { 
00609   if( ( ht_client_id = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param  ) ) == NULL )
00610     {
00611       DisplayLog( "NFS CLIENT_ID: Cannot init Client Id cache" ) ;
00612       return -1 ;
00613     }
00614 
00615   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS;
00616 } /* nfs_Init_client_id */

00629 int nfs_Init_client_id_reverse( nfs_client_id_parameter_t  param ) 
00630 { 
00631   if( ( ht_client_id_reverse = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param_reverse ) ) == NULL )
00632     {
00633       DisplayLog( "NFS CLIENT_ID: Cannot init Client Id cache" ) ;
00634       return -1 ;
00635     }
00636 
00637   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS;
00638 } /* nfs_Init_client_id */

00640 int nfs_client_id_basic_compute( char      * name,
00641                                  clientid4 * pclientid )
00642 {
00643   static uint64_t pid = 0 ;
00644   static uint64_t count = 0 ;
00645   static pthread_mutex_t local_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER ;
00646   if( pid == 0 ) 
00647     pid = (uint64_t)getpid() ;
00648 
00649   if( name == NULL || pclientid == NULL )
00650     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00651 
00652   P( local_mutex ) ;
00653   *pclientid = ((uint64_t)pid << 32) + count ;
00654   count += 1 ;
00655   V( local_mutex ) ;
00656  
00657   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00658 
00659 } /* nfs_client_id_basic_compute */
00660 
00661 
00670 int nfs_client_id_compute( char      * name,
00671                            clientid4 * pclientid )
00672 {
00673   char         padded_name[CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN] ;
00674   clientid4    computed_value = 0 ;
00675   unsigned int i              = 0  ;
00676   unsigned int offset         = 0 ;
00677   uint64_t     extract        = 0 ;
00678   uint64_t     sum            = 0 ;
00679   uint64_t     i1 ;
00680   uint64_t     i2 ;
00681   uint64_t     i3 ;
00682   uint64_t     i4 ;
00683   uint64_t     i5 ;
00684   uint64_t     i6 ;
00685   uint64_t     i7 ;
00686   uint64_t     i8 ;
00687   uint64_t     i9 ;
00688   uint64_t     l  ;
00689 
00690   if( name == NULL || pclientid == NULL )
00691     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00692 
00693   memset( padded_name, 0, CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ) ;
00694 
00695   /* Copy the string to the padded one */
00696   for( i = 0 ; i < strnlen( name, CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ) ; padded_name[i] = name[i], i++ ) ;
00697 
00698 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00699   printf( "%s :", padded_name ) ; 
00700 #endif
00701 
00702   /* For each 9 character pack:
00703    *   - keep the 7 first bit (the 8th is often 0: ascii string) 
00704    *   - pack 7x9 bit to 63 bits using xor
00705    *   - xor the last 8th bit to a single 0 , or-ed with the rest
00706    * Proceeding with the next 9 bytes pack will produce a new value that is xored with the 
00707    * one of the previous iteration */
00708 
00709   for( offset = 0 ; offset < CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ; offset += 9 )
00710     {
00711       /* input name is ascii string, remove 8th bit on each byte, not significant */
00712       i1 = padded_name[offset+0] & 0x7F ;
00713       i2 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x7F ) << 7 ; 
00714       i3 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x7F ) << 14 ; 
00715       i4 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x7F ) << 21 ; 
00716       i5 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x7F ) << 28 ; 
00717       i6 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x7F ) << 35 ; 
00718       i7 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x7F ) << 42 ; 
00719       i8 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x7F ) << 49 ; 
00720       i9 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x7F ) << 56 ; 
00721 
00722   sum = (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+0] +
00723         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+1] +
00724         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+2] +
00725         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+3] +
00726         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+4] +
00727         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+5] +
00728         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+6] +
00729         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+7] +
00730         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+8] ;
00731 
00732 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00733       printf( "|%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx | = ",
00734              i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6, i7, i8, i9 ) ;
00735 #endif
00736 
00737       /* Get xor combibation of all the 8h bit */
00738       l = ( padded_name[offset+0] & 0x80 ) ^
00739           ( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x80 ) ^
00740           ( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x80 ) ^
00741           ( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x80 ) ^
00742           ( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x80 ) ^
00743           ( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x80 ) ^
00744           ( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x80 ) ^
00745           ( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x80 ) ^
00746           ( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x80 ) ^
00747           ( padded_name[offset+9] & 0x80 ) ;
00748     
00749       extract = i1 ^ i2 ^ i3 ^ i4 ^ i5 ^ i6 ^ i7 ^ i8 ^ i9 | l ;
00750 
00751 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00752       printf( "%llx ", extract ) ; 
00753 #endif
00754 
00755       computed_value ^= extract ;
00756       computed_value ^= sum ;
00757     }
00758 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00759   printf( "\n" ) ; 
00760 #endif
00761 
00762       computed_value = (computed_value >> 32 ) ^ (computed_value & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) ;
00763 
00764   *pclientid = computed_value ;
00765   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00766 } /* nfs_client_id_compute */
